TextView.android:text: Do they have access to rehabilitation?
Do they need access to rehabilitation?
Do they have an assistive device? \n(e.g. wheelchair, crutches, prosthetic...
Is your assistive device working well?
Do you need an assistive device?
Are you satisfied with the health services provided?
If No, have you ever been to school before?
Do you want to go to school?
Reason why they do not go to school
Do you feel valued as a \nmember of your community?
Are you able to participate\n in community/Social events?
Does your disability affect \nyour ability to interact socially?
Have you experienced discrimination \nbecause of your disability?
If yes, what do you do?
Does your disability affect\nyour ability to go to work?
Do you have enough food every month?
Are you member of an organisations\n which assist people with disabilities?
Are you aware of your rights as a\n citizen living with disability?
Do you feel like you are able to\n influence people around you?
Do you have access to \nessential items for your household?
